Throughout all the simulations, we are testing independence between network (graph) and its nodes' attributes.

$$H_{0} : f_{GX} = f_{G} \cdot f_{X}$$

(always write test (H0, HA), and test statistic, and alpha, and critical value)


```{r echo=FALSE, message =FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(igraph)
library(RefManageR)
library(xtable)
library(grid)
library(ggplot2)
library(png)
library(grid)
library(knitr)
bib <- ReadBib(system.file("Bib", "biblatexExamples.bib", 
                           package = "RefManageR"), check = FALSE)
BibOptions(check.entries = FALSE, style = "markdown", bib.style = "alphabetic", cite.style = 'alphabetic')
```
